SELECT t.id t_id, t.uuid, t.user_id t_user_id, t.description, t.number, t.date, t.deleted, t.created t_created, t.modified t_modified, s.id s_id, s.transaction_id, s.amount, s.user_id s_user_id, s.from_source, s.to_source, s.memo, s.created s_created, s.modified s_modified, from_balance, to_balance, fs.name from_source_name, ts.name to_source_name, fs.type from_type, ts.type to_type FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN splits s ON s.transaction_id = t.id INNER JOIN sources fs ON fs.id = s.from_source INNER JOIN sources ts ON ts.id = s.to_source WHERE t.user_id = #{user.id}
AND (s.from_source = #{source.id} OR s.to_source = #{source.id})
AND (LOWER(t.description) LIKE LOWER(#{search}) OR coalesce(t.number, '') LIKE LOWER(#{search}) OR coalesce(s.memo, '') LIKE LOWER(#{search}))
ORDER BY t.date DESC, s.id DESC
SELECT count(id) FROM transactions WHERE user_id = #{user.id} AND uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT t.id t_id, t.description, s.id s_id, s.amount, s.from_source, s.to_source FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN splits s ON s.transaction_id = t.id WHERE t.deleted = 'N' AND t.user_id = #{user.id} ORDER BY t.date DESC, s.id DESC

SELECT s.id s_id, s.transaction_id, s.amount, s.user_id s_user_id, s.from_source, s.to_source, s.memo, s.created s_created, s.modified s_modified, from_balance, to_balance FROM splits s INNER JOIN transactions t ON t.id = s.transaction_id WHERE (s.from_source = #{account.id} AND s.from_balance IS NULL) OR (s.to_source = #{account.id} AND s.to_balance IS NULL) AND s.user_id = #{user.id} ORDER BY t.date, s.id FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT s.id s_id, s.transaction_id, s.amount, s.user_id s_user_id, s.from_source, s.to_source, s.memo, s.created s_created, s.modified s_modified, from_balance, to_balance FROM splits s INNER JOIN transactions t ON t.id = s.transaction_id WHERE (s.from_source = #{account.id} OR s.to_source = #{account.id}) AND s.user_id = #{user.id} ORDER BY t.date DESC, s.id DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT s.id s_id, s.transaction_id, s.amount, s.user_id s_user_id, s.from_source, s.to_source, s.memo, s.created s_created, s.modified s_modified, from_balance, to_balance FROM splits s INNER JOIN transactions t ON t.id = s.transaction_id WHERE s.user_id = #{user.id}
AND #{account.id} IN (s.from_source, s.to_source)
AND t.date >= ( SELECT '1900-01-01' t_date FROM transactions t UNION SELECT t.date t_date FROM transactions t WHERE t.date < #{date} ORDER BY t_date DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY )
ORDER BY t.date, s.id
